description:
An incredibly warm merino base layer for the coldest months of the year, the 260 Vertex Long Sleeve Crewe Natural Shades is a go-to piece for winter layering—ideal for skiing, snowshoeing and other cold-weather pursuits. Featuring an odour-resistant, 100% merino wool double jersey jacquard fabric for premium softness, insulation, and breathability, the 260 Vertex is a warmer version of icebreaker’s best-selling Oasis. The gusseted underarms allows for ample range of motion, while flatlock stitching and offset seams throughout makes for a soft next-to-skin feel. The all-over print is inspired by the natural camo of the London Planetree.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fibre that naturally resists odours, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Merino 260 Vertex LS Crewe - Natural Camo - Mens
